ski.name: SHI LINGMING
desc: Summons his Guardian Spirit, Shi Lingming, to smash physical damage in a target area, automatically chasing after nearby enemies. hi Lingming deals area damage and causes Stun with a flurry attack for 0.75s every 2 attacks. Shi Lingming is immune to magical damage and disappears for 5s after a certain number of attacks.
study: Area magical damage, summons Shi Lingming
update: Damage â†‘ Effect â†‘ Cooldown â†“

ski.name: STONE WALL
desc: Casts out a stone wall in a target direction to damage, slowdown and knockback enemies along its path. Wall breaks into rubble at end; affected enemies suffer Root for 0.5s every 1s. Lasts 5s. Passive: Shi Lingming deals more damage nearby rubble, and Beiluo Shimen is immune to CC while nearby rubble.
study: Summons a massive rock wall to knockback enemies and generate a rubble zone

ski.name: STONE DRAGONRIDER
desc: Beiluo Shimen mounts an almighty stone dragon toward a target point, with dragon continuing after dismount before vanishing. Dragon deals punishing damage to enemies touched while causing knockup for 1s. Grants immunity to CC while riding dragon.
study: Summons and rides an almighty dragon to a target location,  dealing damage and slows movement

ski.name: STONE SHRUG
desc: Each basic attack or ability concentrates 1 stack of Stone Might. Stack up 5 times to summon stone arms that increase basic attack range and buff damage dealt. Hitting a target ambushes them, causing Beiluo Shimen to relocate there. Cooldown: 4s. Shi Lingming will focus on ambushed targets.
study: Summons stone arms that increase attack range and damage dealt
